name: Future Memories
description:
click to play. click again to pause.

play around hovering your mouse around the canvas to get different effect affecting the music.
optimised for web browser chrome.

/* if you curious about the nerd stuff :

i made this using p5js. a generative painting over time, that pick the color palette based on a photo that i provide.

it will generate different pattern every time you refresh the browser, accompanied by a seamless loop music that i composed.
 
you can play around with music using your mouse, adding more nuance to the movement of the sound.
 
moving the mouse from left to right of the canvas, 
will alter the panning position of the music (left to right) and the cutoff filter (low to high).

moving the mouse from bottom to top of the canvas,
will alter the resonance of the filter.
*/
